getDocumentPath

public static String getDocumentPath(org.odftoolkit.simple.Document document)
Gets the path where a document is saved.

Parameters:
document - Document.
Returns:
Returns the path. If the document is not saved, then returns null.

saveContentAsXml

public static void saveContentAsXml(org.odftoolkit.simple.Document document)
                             throws Exception
Saves the content of an ODF documents content in four unzipped XML files.
The files are saved in the same folder as the ODF document. The main part of the filename (without the extension) is the same as the ODF document's. The extension of each of the four XML files is:
  • .content.xml
  • .styles.xml
  • .meta.xml
  • .settings.xml

    • Parameters:
    document - Document to save.
    Throws:
    Exception

    isTopLevel

    public static boolean isTopLevel(org.odftoolkit.simple.text.Section section)
                          throws Exception
    Finds if a section is on the top level. A top level section, has the root text element as its parent. A lower level section will have another section or an element of other type as its parent, but not the root text element.

    Parameters:
    section - Section to check.
    Returns:
    Returns true if the specified section is on the top level.
    Throws:
    Exception

    Parameters:

    Returns:

    getOdfElementsForCopy

    public static List<org.odftoolkit.odfdom.pkg.OdfElement> getOdfElementsForCopy(org.odftoolkit.simple.TextDocument document)
                                                                        throws Exception
    Gets the OdfElements of a document, for copying them to another document. This method will return all elements of the document, except from the documents that belong to the following types.

    Parameters:
    document - Document.
    Returns:
    Returns a list of sections.
    Throws:
    Exception

    replaceElementWithContent

    public static void replaceElementWithContent(org.odftoolkit.odfdom.pkg.OdfElement toBeReplaced,
                                             org.odftoolkit.simple.TextDocument target,
                                             org.odftoolkit.simple.TextDocument source)
                                      throws DocumentEngineException
    Replaces the specified OdfElement that belongs to the target TextDocument with the contents of the specified source TextDocument.

    Parameters:
    toBeReplaced - OdfElement of the target TextDocument that will be replaced.
    target - Document being modified. Owner of the specified toBeReplaced OdfElement.
    source - Source document who's content will be inserted in the specified target document replacing the specified toBeReplaced OdfElement.
    Throws:
    DocumentEngineException
